.. role:: bash(code)
   :language: bash
Requirements
=============
To use AIOstack, you need to install some extras tools, here's the list of the requirements

Version 1.0 requirements
-------------------------

psutil
~~~~~~~~~~

:bash:`pip install psutil`


virt-what
~~~~~~~~~~

:bash:`sudo apt-get install virt-what`

or

:bash:`sudo yum install -y virt-what`
